name: The Foray
description:
Two journalists break into a system of tunnels called the Site. They discover why it was kept secret for so long.

 

Writing: Fergus Doyle

Illustrations: Aleksandra Taniberg

Programming: Sebastian F. Koch

Music: Kasper de Haan

Direction: Jonas Krøner

 

Made in two days for InkJam 2022.

Built with Godot & Ink . Typeset with Terminal Grotesque designed by Raphaël Bastide and Jérémy Landes, and released by Velvetyne Type Foundry.
